algorithm_technique: Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) and Median of Medians (Quickselect)
problem_summary_simple: Make all subarray sums of length k equal in a circular array with minimum operations.
problem_summary_technical: Group elements by index modulo GCD(k, n). For each group, find the median and sum absolute differences to make them equal.
key_insights: The circularity and subarray sum constraint imply that elements at indices i, i+k, i+2k, ... (modulo n) are related.
The number of independent groups is GCD(k, n).
Within each group, making all elements equal to the median minimizes the sum of absolute differences.
